issue.title: [CF 154] B: 4.0.1 beta 3 - DeathKnight Bug
issue.body:
When i log other characters i don't get any error; when i log my DK i get this error and all my profile and groups get fucked up :/

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Login a Death Knight
2. On login, you get the below error
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?

I think it's a problem with the presence detection.. or something similar. In the past i created in my profile some rule about dk presences.. but i can't rememer exactly .. it was working like a charm since months :D.
For sure i had a group showing up Unholy Presence icon when i forgot to set it up.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)

Beta 4.0.1 Beta 3

Do you have an error log of what happened?

Message: AceLocale-3.0: TellMeWhen: Missing entry for 'PRESENCE'
Time: 04/09/11 09:40:21
Count: 1
Stack: Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\conditions.lua:1063: in main chunk

Locals: <none>

Please provide any additional information below.


> Posted by CurseForge user Adam77 | Imported from CurseForge issue #154 | Raw

comments.body:
This is just a missing translation - it shouldn't be breaking anything except the display of the word "Presence" showing up in the condition menu as "PRESENCE"


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
